<available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.ng.fd" name="Form Designer" version="1.0.0" state="published" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description>Form Designer</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.dc"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.tablet.theme"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.themes.doctype"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SecurityNGFD" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.SecurityNGFD" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="table_fields" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.NGFieldsProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="table_views" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.NGViewsProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="fd.form" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.NGFormProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="popupform" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.NGPopupFormProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="fd.form_save" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.NGFormSaveProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="field_types" class="com.glide.ui.ng.fd.NGFieldTypesProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="tables" class="com.glide.ui.ng.NGTablesProcessor" /> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Form Designer</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.ng.fd</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Form Designer</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.ng.fd/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.ng.dc,com.glide.ui.tablet.theme,com.glide.ui.ng,com.glide.ui.themes.doctype</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state>
